original_title: Sugar Ray Robinson: The Bright Lights and Dark Shadows of a Champion
overview: This sports documentary tells the remarkable story of the man voted the greatest boxer in history. Spanning his career from the early Depression-era days until his death in 1989, this special brings to light the many sides of Robinson: flashy public icon, womanizer, comeback kid, philanthropist, fighter. Includes rare film footage, never-before-seen home movies and interviews.
title: Sugar Ray Robinson: The Bright Lights and Dark Shadows of a Champion
